attributes.action: Stop immigrants rights to work for the first five years of residence in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
By taking away the opportunity to come to the UK to take advantage of employment earnings,immigrants should be forced to only come into the country if they have a good reason to be here,apart from the opportunity to make money.
The working opportunities in the UK promote immigrants to come here just to work,which takes not only jobs but money away from the British citizens.
By taking away the opportunity to work for five years less immigrants will want to come to the UK,which will give employment back to the british, stopping unemployment figures rising.
